overview: The annual Quiksilver Pro held in South East Queensland is regarded as the number one stop on the ASP World Tour by the surfers, surf fans and the free-wheelin', hard partying industry crew that anchor themselves to the event for weeks each year.  The perfect, barreling waves of Snapper Rocks, the idyllic high-performance peaks of world-renowned Duranbah and other semi-secret locations provide the ultimate playground for the world's best surfers to go nuts.  See eventual winner Kelly Slater (the eight time world champ) dominate local favourite and reigning Aussie World Champion Mick Fanning. See Parko, Dane Reynolds, Jordy, French rookie Flores, Durbidge and co. push them to the wire.  Plus follow Mr. Matt Hoy backstage as he goes behind the scenes at the Quiksilver Pro Show music festival, interviews some true surfing legends and uncovers, rare candid moments with some surprise celebrity guests.
title: Quiksilver Pro 2008: Gold Coast
